title: Implementation Consultant, EMEA
content:
Who we are
About Stripe
Stripe is a financial infrastructure platform for businesses. Millions of companies—from the world’s largest enterprises to the most ambitious startups—use Stripe to accept payments, grow their revenue, and accelerate new business opportunities. Our mission is to increase the GDP of the internet, and we have a staggering amount of work ahead. That means you have an unprecedented opportunity to put the global economy within everyone’s reach while doing the most important work of your career.
About the team
As part of the Implementation Consultant team at Stripe, you are the driving force behind our strategic clients. Your role is key in leading them through the integration process, turning them into long-term transacting Stripe users. Our team's core objective is to provide an efficient, seamless transition for our clients, assuring top-notch user satisfaction and relationship management.

In this role, you’d be joining the Professional Services team. Our team’s mission is to Empower every Stripe user to achieve maximum value from their investment quickly and confidently
Our team helps Stripe increase the GDP of the internet by supporting the success of our large, intricate Stripe projects. This involves guiding users through their integration process, project planning, coordinating with stakeholders, handling deliverables, meeting key timelines, and educating our users about the maximum potential they can achieve with Stripe

What you’ll do
As an Implementation Consultant, you will be managing the full onboarding cycle for mid-market and enterprise companies from contract signing through launch. You will proactively develop and manage integration architecture, change management strategy, and timelines. You will be expected to collaborate across departments, including Sales, Technical Services, Product, and Engineering, to ensure a successful transition for our clients.
Responsibilities

Own the full onboarding cycle for mid-market and enterprise companies from contract signing through launch
Develop, manage, and implement a customer’s integration architecture, change management strategy, and timeline
Partner with other Sales and Technical Services teams to improve the overall Stripe user journey 
Engage with Product and Engineering teams to help drive product strategy for large users
Collaborate with teammates on strategic projects that improve and scale our implementation process and team operations

Who you are
We’re looking for someone who meets the minimum requirements to be considered for the role. If you meet these requirements, you are encouraged to apply. The preferred qualifications are a bonus, not a requirement.
Minimum requirements

4+ years of experience working with strategic customers on technology solutions, with a track record of top performance
Ability to understand complex business requirements and craft tailored solutions
Quick learner with the ability to explain technical concepts to Stripe’s largest customers
Proven project management skills and strong critical thinking abilities 
Experience identifying and solving internal process inefficiencies 
Superior verbal and written communication skills
Ability to operate independently in a highly ambiguous and fast-paced environment

Preferred qualifications

Additional written & verbal languages are a nice to have (German, Spanish, French, Italian) 
Prior experience at a growth stage Internet/software company
Experience in the payments industry
Knowledge of APIs

questions.label: Please select the country where you currently reside.
Please select the country or countries you anticipate working in for the role in which you are applying.
Are you authorized to work in the location(s) you selected in your previous response?
Will you require Stripe to sponsor you for a work permit now or in the future for the location(s) you selected in in your previous response?
